TextLibrary.Text: Your government owes the Elysians money.
Your government owes the Elysians money.
Would love to pay them back, yes! We make deal?
Would love to pay them back, yes! We make deal?
You fight Vortraag for us. We give 5000 Credits and give money back to Elysians. Go! Go to Pleione Rho!
You fight Vortraag for us. We give 5000 Credits and give money back to Elysians. Go! Go to Pleione Rho!
